question: When you make ANY type of Special 7 Mocha Chiller (inlcluding Originals), it will require ___ the total scoops of flavor to be dark chocolate.
How do you build a half-sweet Mocha Chiller (no flavor/plain)?

answerChoices.choice1: Regular chiller + 1/4 total flavor scoop(s) of dark chocolate
answerChoices.choice2: Regular chiller + 1/2 total flavor scoop(s) of dark chocolate
answerChoices.choice3: 1/2 mocha chiller + 1/2 regular chiller mixed in a cup
answerChoices.choice4: Mocha Chiller + 1/2 total flavor scoop(s) of cane sugar

question: What is the correct way to drizzle if it is required?.

answerChoices.choice1: Drizzle as you please and make it pretty!
answerChoices.choice2: One inch at the bottom of the cup.
answerChoices.choice3: Drizzle one ring around the top of the cup.

question: If drizzle and whipped cream/cold foam is required, you do not have to put drizzle on top of the whipped cream or cold foam.
If two smoothie flavors are requested in a drink, you must handblend both smoothie flavors together in a blender (example: strawberry mango smoothie).
This is the correct way to make a medium plain decaf mocha chiller: 3 dark chocolate, 2 shots decaf espresso, then fill to the 9 with mocha mix.
If a kid's iced blondie is ordered, how many shots of espresso are used?
If an extra shot chiller is ordered, put the espresso straight into the plastic cup and then fill with chiller.
If a secret menu drink is requested with an additional flavor, the additional flavor will take up ___ of the total scoops of flavor unless otherwise requested (example: a strawberry Ocean Breeze).
We do flat, even scoops for flavor.
